articles.title: UK reports 25 fresh cases of blood clots linked to AstraZeneca vaccine - Financial Times

articles.description: US and European scientists have called off a controversial balloon test flight that was to take place in Sweden's far north in June, part of a disputed solar geoengineering experiment to artificially cool the planet.
articles.title: Controversial test flight aimed at cooling the planet cancelled - Manila Bulletin
